Title: Director, Digital Development
RoleDescription:
The purpose of this job is to lead and oversee technology initiatives across digital channels, driving the strategic development, implementation, and management of digital-focused technology solutions. This role bridges technology, business strategy, and user experience to drive innovation, operational efficiency, and customer engagement. It will support operational efficiency, improve customer experience, and drive revenue growth through digital innovation and seamless integration of in-store and online technology. The Director will work closely with cross-functional teams in technology, retail operations, digital marketing, and customer service to align technology strategies with the organizations goals.Develop and execute a comprehensive digital technology strategy that aligns with business goals and market trends.Oversee the design, development, and deployment of digital platforms (e.g., websites, mobile apps, e-commerce platforms).Ensure the scalability, security, and performance of digital solutions.Identify and implement emerging technologies to enhance the organizations digital capabilities.Lead the evaluation, selection, and integration of third-party technology solutions and vendors.Build and maintain strategic vendor relationships, negotiating contracts and ensuring high-quality deliverables.Drive digital transformation initiatives, ensuring seamless integration between in-store and online systems.Advocate for a digital-first culture across the organization to drive innovation and adoption of new solutions.Partner with cross-functional teams to align technology initiatives with sales, marketing, and operational goals.Identify and evaluate emerging technologies to maintain a competitive edge and foster innovation.Optimize the customer experience by driving personalization, analytics adoption, and omnichannel capabilities.Establish and monitor KPIs and ROI for technology initiatives to ensure alignment with financial and performance objectives.Lead compliance efforts, ensuring all systems and processes adhere to industry regulations and security standards.Build, mentor, and lead a high-performing digital technology team, including developers and quality assurance engineers, Foster a team culture of collaboration, accountability and continuous improvement.Oversee budgeting for digital technology projects, balancing cost efficiency with innovation.Champion innovation by sourcing new solutions and staying updated on industry trends and advancements.Align technology strategy with broader business goals to drive operational excellence and long-term growth.Bachelors degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field (masters degree preferred).Minimum ten years experience in technology roles with a focus on digital or consumer-facing technology, including 5+ years in a management or leadership roleStrong understanding of digital solutions such as mobile apps, websites, customer data platforms, and API management tools.Experience with data analytics, business intelligence tools, and reporting systems.Knowledge of cloud-based infrastructure, cybersecurity, and data privacy in a retail setting. Experience with eCommerce platforms, mobile payment technologies, and digital wallets.Familiarity with agile and DevOps methodologies in a digital context.Visionary Leadership: Ability to anticipate trends and align digital strategies with long-term goals.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with experience in using data to drive decisions.Drive to explore new technologies and approaches for continuous improvement.Risk Management: Expertise in navigating challenges related to technology adoption and implementationStrategic thinking Ability to manage a cross-functional team Financial and analytical acumen Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to influence stakeholders at all levels.
 Travel required less than 25%General office work requiring sitting or standing for long periods of time

Title: Deli General Manager
RoleDescription: Pilot Flying J is seeking an experienced Deli General Manager to oversee our high-volume retail facilities. You will be responsible for the generation and execution of travel center and restaurant business plans to achieve established standards, sales and profit objectives as well as customer satisfaction. The Deli General Manager will also be:Ensuring that customer expectations are metConducting meetings with subordinate employeesMaintaining effective vendor relationshipsAs a Deli General Manager for Pilot Flying J, you will build, coach, manage and develop teams from a staffing, interviewing, hiring and training standpoint. Additional responsibilities for the Deli General Manager include:Driving salesManaging team membersTracking inventoryProviding customer servicePerforming P&L analysisPay Rates Starting between: $42,300.00 - $61,370.00 / yearAs a Deli General Manager, you must exemplify integrity and accountability at the managerial level as well as demonstrate excellent team leadership skills. Furthermore, you must be able to work a flexible schedule of nights, days, weekends and holidays.
